languages.text: "Пустое упрямство не красит человека ваших кровей, Вольный Торговец. Но раз вы решили все отрицать — я вызову еще одного свидетеля. Уверен, всем будет интересно посмотреть на эту гнусную историю с еще одной стороны".

traits.locale_text: "Пустое упрямство не красит человека ваших кровей, Вольный Торговец. Но раз вы решили все отрицать — я вызову еще одного свидетеля. Уверен, всем будет интересно посмотреть на эту гнусную историю с еще одной стороны".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."
languages.original_text: "Пустое упрямство не красит человека ваших кровей, Вольный Торговец. Но раз вы решили все отрицать — я вызову еще одного свидетеля. Уверен, всем будет интересно посмотреть на эту гнусную историю с еще одной стороны".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « L'entêtement crasse ne sied pas à une personne de votre envergure, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais puisque vous avez décidé de nier en bloc, je vais appeler à la barre un nouveau témoin. Je suis sûr que l'assemblée sera ravie de découvrir cette sordide histoire sous un nouveau jour. »
languages.original_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."

traits.locale_text: « L'entêtement crasse ne sied pas à une personne de votre envergure, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais puisque vous avez décidé de nier en bloc, je vais appeler à la barre un nouveau témoin. Je suis sûr que l'assemblée sera ravie de découvrir cette sordide histoire sous un nouveau jour. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “像你这么位高权重的人，可不该这么冥顽不灵，行商浪人。不过，既然你打算否认所有指控，那我准备传唤另一名证人。我相信，所有人都会认为这个充满邪恶与阴谋的故事非常有趣。”
languages.original_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."

traits.locale_text: “像你这么位高权重的人，可不该这么冥顽不灵，行商浪人。不过，既然你打算否认所有指控，那我准备传唤另一名证人。我相信，所有人都会认为这个充满邪恶与阴谋的故事非常有趣。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「その呆れるほどの頑固さは、あなたのような血統の{mf|男|女}にはふさわしくないだろう、自由開拓者よ。だがあなたがすべてを否定すると決めた以上、別の証人を召喚せねばなるまい。このおぞましい物語を別の角度から紐解いていけば、誰もが興味を引かれるに違いないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."

traits.locale_text: 「その呆れるほどの頑固さは、あなたのような血統の{mf|男|女}にはふさわしくないだろう、自由開拓者よ。だがあなたがすべてを否定すると決めた以上、別の証人を召喚せねばなるまい。このおぞましい物語を別の角度から紐解いていけば、誰もが興味を引かれるに違いないだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Dickköpfige Sturheit ziemt sich nicht für {mf|einen Mann|eine Frau} Eures Renommees, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Da Ihr Euch entschieden habt, alles zu leugnen, werde ich einen weiteren Zeugen kommen lassen. Ich bin mir sicher, wir können es alle kaum erwarten, diese schmutzige Geschichte noch aus einem anderen Blickwinkel zu hören."
languages.original_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."

traits.locale_text: "Dickköpfige Sturheit ziemt sich nicht für {mf|einen Mann|eine Frau} Eures Renommees, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Da Ihr Euch entschieden habt, alles zu leugnen, werde ich einen weiteren Zeugen kommen lassen. Ich bin mir sicher, wir können es alle kaum erwarten, diese schmutzige Geschichte noch aus einem anderen Blickwinkel zu hören."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «La tozudez de una mula no es propia de {mf|un hombre|una mujer} de su alcurnia, Comerciante Independiente. Pero ya que ha decidido negarlo todo, llamaré a declarar a otro testigo. Estoy convencido de que todos encontrarán muy interesante explorar esta sórdida historia desde otra perspectiva».
languages.original_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."

traits.locale_text: «La tozudez de una mula no es propia de {mf|un hombre|una mujer} de su alcurnia, Comerciante Independiente. Pero ya que ha decidido negarlo todo, llamaré a declarar a otro testigo. Estoy convencido de que todos encontrarán muy interesante explorar esta sórdida historia desde otra perspectiva».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Dik başlılık ve inatçılık, bu soydan gelen bir {mf|adama|kadına} hiç yakışmıyor Hür Tacir. Madem her şeyi reddetmeye kararlısın, başka bir tanık daha çağıracağım. Eminim bu menfur hikâyeyi başka bir açıdan ele almak herkes için ilginç olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Bull-headed stubbornness does not befit a {mf|man|woman} of your pedigree, Rogue Trader. But since you have decided to deny everything, I will summon another witness. I am sure everyone will find it interesting to explore this sordid story from another angle."

traits.locale_text: "Dik başlılık ve inatçılık senin soyundan gelen bir {mf|adama|kadına} hiç yakışmıyor Hür Tacir ama madem her şeyi reddetmeye karar verdin, başka bir tanık daha çağıracağım. Eminim bu menfur hikâyeyi başka bir açıdan ele almak herkes için ilginç olacaktır."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
